caption: A couple sits warmly on the living room sofa, laughing and conversing, nestled closely together. That evening, near a Ferris wheel, an aquarium is about to close. An elderly woman is visiting when suddenly a man calls out to her, making it seem as if she has committed a crime. She wears a pained expression, confessing everything. Just then, another woman, filled with rage, rushes towards them seeking revenge but is halted when the elderly woman draws a gun on her. Meanwhile, another man is hastily arriving in a taxi. Inside the aquarium, a man dressed in black confronts the elderly woman, with police officers surrounding her as well.
